simulation.title: Simulation
simulation.solverDescription: Choose the numerical method used to solve the differential equations. Different methods offer trade-offs between accuracy and performance.
simulation.solverRK4Description: Classic fixed-step method with good accuracy and stability. Best for most simulations.
simulation.solverAdaptiveRK45Description: Variable step size method that automatically adjusts precision. Best for high accuracy requirements.
simulation.solverAdaptiveEulerDescription: Simple adaptive method with variable step size. Good for testing and debugging.
simulation.solverModifiedMidpointDescription: Fixed-step method with improved stability. Good alternative to RK4.
simulation.rendererDescription: Choose the rendering method for particle visualization.
simulation.rendererWebGLDescription: Hardware-accelerated rendering. Better performance for many particles.
simulation.showModalControlsDescription: Show controls for visualizing individual mode shapes on the Chladni plate.

driverControl.label: Driver Control Box
driverControl.description: Controls for the oscillating driver plate that powers the resonators
driverControl.powerToggleDescription: Toggles the driving force on or off
driverControl.frequencySliderDescription: Adjusts the frequency of the oscillating driver plate
driverControl.amplitudeSliderDescription: Adjusts the amplitude of the oscillating driver plate
driverControl.sweepButtonDescription: Automatically sweeps through the frequency range from minimum to maximum

playbackControl.label: Playback Controls
playbackControl.description: Controls for simulation playback speed and play/pause
playbackControl.speedControlDescription: Choose between slow and normal simulation speed

resonatorPanel.label: Resonator Control Panel
resonatorPanel.description: Controls for configuring resonators including mass, spring constant, and damping
resonatorPanel.resonatorCountDescription: Adjusts how many resonators are shown
resonatorPanel.configDescription: Choose how multiple resonators are configured
resonatorPanel.massControlDescription: Adjusts the mass of the selected resonator
resonatorPanel.springConstantControlDescription: Adjusts the spring stiffness of the selected resonator
resonatorPanel.dampingControlDescription: Adjusts the damping coefficient for all resonators
resonatorPanel.gravityToggleDescription: Turns gravity on or off for the simulation
resonatorPanel.rulerCheckboxDescription: Shows or hides the measurement ruler

resonator.springDescription: Elastic spring connecting mass {{number}} to the driver plate
resonator.massDescription: Draggable mass on resonator {{number}}. Use arrow keys to move vertically.

a11y.excitationMarkerDescription: Draggable marker showing where the plate is driven. Use arrow keys to move. Hold Shift for fine control.
a11y.modalShapeDescription: Shows the theoretical vibration pattern for mode ({{m}}, {{n}}). Blue regions move down, red regions move up, white lines are nodal lines where the plate doesn't move.
a11y.displacementColormapDescription: Color overlay showing plate displacement at the current frequency. Blue indicates downward displacement, red indicates upward displacement, and white shows nodal lines where particles collect.
a11y.rulerDescription: Ruler showing plate dimensions. Width: {{width}} cm, Height: {{height}} cm. Major tick marks every 5 cm.
a11y.gridDescription: Grid overlay for spatial reference on the {{width}} cm by {{height}} cm plate. Major grid lines every 5 cm, minor lines every 1 cm.

controlPanel.materialDescription: Choose the plate material which affects resonance frequencies
controlPanel.frequencyDescription: Adjust the driving frequency of the plate
controlPanel.sweepButtonDescription: Automatically sweep through the frequency range to find resonances
controlPanel.grainsDescription: Select the number of particles on the plate
controlPanel.replenishButtonDescription: Reset particles to the selected count
controlPanel.boundaryModeDescription: Choose what happens to particles at plate edges
controlPanel.showResonanceCurveDescription: Toggle visibility of the resonance amplitude graph
controlPanel.showRulerDescription: Toggle visibility of the measurement ruler
controlPanel.showGridDescription: Toggle visibility of the reference grid
controlPanel.showColormapDescription: Toggle visibility of the displacement colormap
